issue.title: Pagination is not show in resources page
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Since 4.2.0 Beta-1, pagination is not shown in Resources page.
Seems to come from source:/trunk/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/site/views/resources/tmpl/default.php#L125
Lines: 125, 310, 317 @$show@ variable
I suppose there was meant to be a test if there is results or not, but nothing appears in the code.

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
